1.0.1.en: Added button to open URL for the API Key

1.0.2.en: Changed target to Homey Pro only.

1.0.3.en: Handle crash when PM2.5 goes offline. Setup Diagnostic log Maintenance action on all devices.

1.0.4.en: Handle crash when PM2.5 goes offline. Setup Diagnostic log Maintenance action on all devices.

1.0.5.en: Handle crash when PM2.5 goes offline. Setup Diagnostic log Maintenance action on all devices.

1.0.6.en: Trap missing location when adding a device.

1.0.7.en: Added last rained capability and Flow cards to station.

1.0.8.en: Added extra validation to fix crashes on bad data.

1.0.9.en: Fix error when PM2.5 reading is above highest value in the AQITable table.

1.0.10.en: Ensure raw date is a string when date is converted.

1.0.11.en: Setup / extend polling just in case we don't receive real time updates for some reason. This will ensure the device data is updated at least every 10 minutes.

1.0.12.en: Increase polling time to 2 minutes to keep within API rate limits.
